In most affected individuals, the muscle problems associated with this condition do not worsen with time. However, at least two people with a severe variant of this disorder have experienced progressive muscle weakness and wasting starting in childhood.",GHR,myopathy with deficiency of iron-sulfur cluster assembly enzyme
